00034 #ifndef CONVERSIONS_H
00035 #define CONVERSIONS_H
00036 
00037 #include <string>
00038 #include <cassert>
00039 #include <sstream>
00040 
00041 
00053 template <typename T>
00054 inline T fromStringTo (const std::string& inputString)
00055 {
00056    T result;
00057    std::istringstream stream(inputString);
00058    assert(stream >> result);
00059    return result;
00060    // This must be done by launching an exception.
00061 }
00062 
00073 template <typename T>
00074 inline std::string somethingToString(const T& something)
00075 {
00076    std::ostringstream outputStream;
00077    outputStream << something;
00078    return outputStream.str();
00079 }
00080 
00081 #endif
